import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import moment from 'moment'; import axios from 'axios'; import { cursor, offset } from './../../routePlan'; import PlaceImg from './../assets/ic_place.svg'; import StoreImg from './../assets/ic_store.svg'; import CalImg from './../assets/ic_cal.svg'; import DeleteImg from './../assets/ic_delete.svg'; import EditImg from './../assets/ic_edit.svg'; import './../styles/outletCard.css' function nextPath(path) { let history = useHistory() history.push(path); } export class OutletCard extends Component { render() { return ( this.props.outlet ?
+880{this.props.outlet.outlet_number}
{this.props.outlet.name}
{this.props.outlet.area}, {this.props.outlet.territory}
{cursor[this.props.outlet.cursor]}, {offset[this.props.outlet.offset]}
{this.props.outlet.outlet_type}
অন্তর্ভুক্তির তারিখঃ
{moment(this.props.outlet.updated_at).format('ll')}
{ this.props.action ? <>
ডিলিট করবেন?
আপনি কি আউটলেটটি আপনার রুটপ্ল্যান থেকে ডিলিট করতে চান?
: null }
: null ) } } export default OutletCard
